price: 114. Accomplis la Çalât aux deux extrémités du jour et à certains moments de la nuit. Les bonnes œuvres effacent les mauvaises. Voilà un rappel pour ceux qui savent se rappeler.
arabic: وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ طَرَفَيِ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَزُلَفٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡحَسَنَٰتِ يُذۡهِبۡنَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِۚ ذَٰلِكَ ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلذَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqimi al-ṣalata ṭarafayi al-nahāri wazulafan mina al-layli inna al-ḥasanāti yudh'hib'na al-sayiāti dhālika dhik'rā lildhākirīna
